mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.title, IFNULL(u.nickname, "탈퇴 회원") as writer, f.created_at, f.view_cnt FROM user u RIGHT OUTER JOIN free f ON u.id = f.user_id
SELECT f.id, f.title, u.nickname as writer, f.content, f.file, f.created_at, f.updated_at, f.view_cnt, f.report FROM user u JOIN free f ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE f.id = #{no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free(title, user_id, file, content) VALUES (#{title}, (SELECT id FROM user WHERE nickname = #{writer}), #{file}, #{content})
